articles.title: Asia shares dip on hawkish Fed remarks; recession risk weighs on commodities, oil - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares fell on Tuesday, commodities shed recent gains from China's reopening, and oil traded lower following hawkish comments from two U.S. Federal Reserve officials overnight, with investors turning cautious ahead of key inflation data.
